author: kingpanther13
releaseNotes:
v0.7.1 - Bug fixes and safety improvements:

- Add safety gate to delete_rule: now requires confirm=true parameter (consider export_rule first for backup)
- Add bounds checking to time trigger format parsing (prevents crash on malformed HH:mm)
- Add null validation for set_mode and set_hsm actions (log error instead of crash)
- Add try-catch to button handler integer parsing (prevents crash on invalid input)
- Fix version header description (was showing v0.6.13 features)

v0.7.0 - Room management tools: list_rooms, get_room, create_room, delete_room, rename_room. Fix room assignment (use roomId field). 73 MCP tools total.

v0.6.15 - Room assignment fix: API uses 'roomId' field not 'id' (discovered from API error response). Removes device from old room before adding to new room.

v0.6.14 - Room assignment: POST /room/save with JSON content type, form-encoded, hub2/ prefix, Grails command object pattern.

v0.6.13 - Room assignment: try PUT /room/<id> (Grails RESTful update), POST /room/save, POST /room/update, probe /room/list HTML for endpoint discovery. Adds verification via getRooms().

v0.6.12 - Fix room assignment: use GET /room/addDevice with query params. POST returned 405 (Method Not Allowed), confirming it's a GET endpoint. Tries 7 GET param combinations + 3 POST fallbacks. Adds post-save verification via getRooms() to detect silent failures.

v0.6.11 - Fix room assignment: use /room/ controller endpoints to add device to room. /device/save ignores roomId; rooms are managed from the room side.

v0.6.10 - Fix room assignment: use fullJson device data for /device/save (Vue.js SPA has no HTML forms).

v0.6.8 - Room assignment: capture 500 error response body for diagnosis

v0.6.7 - Fix room assignment: add Grails version field for optimistic locking

v0.6.6 - Room assignment: diagnostic build with device JSON dump

v0.6.5 - Fix room assignment: use deviceTypeId field

- The device JSON field is deviceTypeId, not typeId (was null, causing /device/save 500)

v0.6.4 - Fix room assignment: extract device data from nested fullJson.device key

v0.6.3 - Fix update_device room assignment (500) and enable/disable (404) bugs

- Fix room assignment: use flat field names for /device/save (Grails convention, no device. prefix)
- Fix enable/disable: use POST instead of GET for /device/disable endpoint
- Add case-insensitive room name matching
- Add comprehensive debug logging throughout update_device

v0.6.2 - Add update_device tool (68 tools total)

- New update_device: modify label, name, room, enable/disable, preferences, data values, and DNI on any accessible device
- Room assignment via hub internal /device/save endpoint
- Enable/disable via hub internal /device/disable endpoint
- Label, name, DNI, data values, preferences via official Hubitat API

v0.6.1 - Fix BigDecimal.round() crash in daily version update checker + sync rule app version

- Fix checkForUpdate() crashing nightly at 3 AM due to BigDecimal.round(1) in Hubitat Groovy sandbox
- Replace with pure integer math (compare milliseconds, cast to int for display)
- Full audit of all division/rounding patterns across both apps â€” no other instances found
- Sync hubitat-mcp-rule.groovy version from 0.4.7 to 0.6.1

v0.6.0 - Virtual device creation and management:

- New create_virtual_device: create virtual switches, buttons, sensors, and more as MCP-managed child devices
- New list_virtual_devices: list all MCP-managed virtual devices with current states
- New delete_virtual_device: remove MCP-managed virtual devices
- Virtual devices are automatically accessible to all MCP device tools without manual selection
- Supports 15 virtual device types (Switch, Button, Contact Sensor, Motion Sensor, etc.)
- Virtual devices appear in Hubitat UI for sharing with Maker API, Dashboard, Rule Machine, etc.
- 67 MCP tools total (up from 64 in v0.5.x)

v0.5.4 - Fix BigDecimal arithmetic using pure integer math (device_health_check + delete_device)

v0.5.3 - Fix BigDecimal.round() in device_health_check

v0.5.2 - Fix device_health_check error handling

v0.5.1 - Fix get_hub_logs JSON array parsing

v0.5.0 - Monitoring tools and device management:

- New get_hub_logs: access Hubitat built-in system logs with level/source filtering
- New get_device_history: time-range event queries with attribute filtering via eventsSince()
- New get_hub_performance: performance snapshots with CSV time-series trend tracking
- New device_health_check: detect stale/offline devices across all selected devices
- New delete_device: force-delete ghost/orphaned devices with comprehensive safeguards
- 64 MCP tools total (up from 59 in v0.4.x)

v0.4.8 - Fix Z-Wave/Zigbee endpoint compatibility for firmware 2.3.7.1+
v0.4.7 - Comprehensive bug fixes from code review (10 fixes)
v0.4.6 - Fix version mismatch bug in optimistic locking
v0.4.5 - Smart large-file handling (chunked reading, resave mode, sourceFile mode)
